title: Pixel Watch, Pixel Buds Pro, and more: All the hardware announced at Google I/O
content:
For most of its existence, Google has been seen as a software and services company. It’s the company millions rely on for search, emails, and documents. But if today’s Google I/O presentation is anything to go by, Google really wants to make sure it’s known as a hardware company too. Granted, Google has been building its hardware portfolio for years now, but devices have sometimes felt like a side gig for the company — products destined for the Google graveyard. Then the company announced the Pixel 6 and revealed its in house processor, the Google Tensor, signaling a deeper commitment to hardware.…

This story continues at The Next Web

Or just read more coverage about: Google
description: Google announces a litany of devices at Google I/O, including the Pixel Watch, Pixel Buds Pro, Pixel 6A, and futuristic AR glasses.
